abstract.p: NYC traffic alert for week's Millennium Summit at UN (S)

block.p: Foreign dignitaries are gathering this week for the Millennium Summit at the United Nations.

STREET CLOSINGS First Avenue, from 42nd to 47th Streets; the First Avenue underpass will remain open, but no trucks or panel vans will be permitted to enter. 44th and 45th Streets, from First to Second Avenues. 58th Street, from Fifth Avenue to Avenue of the Americas.
